explains: v. 仿效，模仿；仿真；努力赶上

sentences.en: Sons are traditionally expected to emulate their fathers.
sentences.cn: 传统上认为儿子应该效仿他们的父亲。

sentences.en: They may be able to emulate the dripping sound of a crosswalk, or the buzz of a power tool.
sentences.cn: 他们或许可以效仿人行横道的滴滴声，或者电动工具的嗡嗡声。

sentences.en: But before we try to emulate geniuses or encourage our children to do so we should note that some of the things we learn from them may prove unpalatable.
sentences.cn: 但在我们试图模仿天才或鼓励我们的孩子这样做之前，我们应该注意到，我们从他们身上学到的一些东西可能并不适合我们。
